name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications, primarily focusing on interactive user interfaces. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and modern frameworks such as **React**, **Tailwind CSS**, **Bootstrap**, and **Foundation**. Strong skills in UI/UX design and development, ensuring seamless user experiences while adhering to best practices in debugging and troubleshooting.
Experienced in integrating **REST APIs** and maintaining source control through **GitHub** and **GitLab**. Familiar with **WordPress** and **WooCommerce** for content management and e-commerce solutions. Additionally, I am well-acquainted with SEO strategies to optimize applications for search engines.
Hands-on expertise in frontend development, combined with a solid understanding of backend integration and cloud deployment using **AWS** and **Azure**, allows me to deliver compliant and efficient solutions in fast-paced environments.
